Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with centre in added red; top of rim glazed; exterior: at rim, band of 'S' between pairs of black bands; reserved below.
Curator's comments: for parallels regarding the rim pattern, see British Museum 1888,0601.474.t+.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0419) (phase 2)
